Hi ,

I =
found profile-crawler.cxml in that zip .where to keep it ?

Thanks for the =
constant Help :)

 From: Kristinn Sigur=

To: "archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com=
" <archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com> 
Sent: Friday, May 17, 2013 4:15 PM
Sub=
ject: RE: [archive-crawler] Combining Heritrix with DeDuplicator
 


=C2=A0=
 
You are probably using the version built against Heritrix 1.x. 
=C2=A0
I =
just realized that the links to builds against Heritrix 3.x (http://dedupli=
cator.sourceforge.net/release3.html) have rotted.
=C2=A0
You can either che=
ck the source out from GitHub (https://github.com/kris-sigur/deduplicator) =
and run mvn assembly:assembly to generate the correct dist tarball or grab =
it from this temporary location: https://docs.google.com/file/d/0Bzn95aEw9Y=
mSQk5KdE9RWTJJc2c/edit?usp=3Dsharing
=C2=A0
I=E2=80=99d rebuild the index o=
nce you install the correct version of the DeDuplicator. Also make sure to =
remove the old lucene and deduplicator jars that were dropped in Heritrix=
=E2=80=99s lib folder by the old version.
=C2=A0
- Kris
=C2=A0
